summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Downtown Seattle Transit Project granting and establishing the conditions and a procedure for the impementing of a tunnel permit for pedestrian access to the subterranean mezzanine under Pine Street in the vicinity of Fourth Avenue and Fifth Avenue if the Municipality of Metropolitan Seattle ceases to use the mezzanine for public transportation purposes or abandons the mezzanine and the City of Seattle decides not to maintain and operate the mezzanine.
